profile.title: HELLO, MY NAME IS CHOUHAN.
profile.tagline: Rakesh Chouhan, 33 years old, born and grew up in Hyderabad, India. Currently working in Charlotte, NC. Highly motivated, a solution driven developer.

qualities.title: Qualities I carry...
qualities.tagline: I love what I do. I take great pride in what I do. And I can't do something halfway, three-quarters, nine-tenths. If I'm going to do something, I go all the way.

resume.title: My Resume
resume.tagline: If you call failures experiments, you can put them in your resume and claim them as achievements.

clients.title: Projects & Clients
clients.tagline: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today. - Elbert Hubbard

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.tagline: A winner is someone who recognizes his God-given talents, works his tail off to develop them into skills, and uses these skills to accomplish his goals.

knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.tagline: Knowledge comes from learning. Wisdom comes from living and Wisdom begins with Wonder.

accolades.title: Accolades
accolades.tagline: The accolades, just like the scrapes and bruises, fade in the end, and all you're left with is your ambition.

milestones.title: Milestones Achieved
milestones.tagline: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process - Vincent Van Gogh
